Assigning to Joe as it could be some remotevm/edit part problem. Joe, please let
me know if snippet update is doing something wrong.

Several problems here.  First the edit parts had to clean up the fact that their
child had changed, but after that the target VM was showing up an extra
duplicate composite as a child of the tab folder.  The reason was the ordering
that the EMF model was being updated - first the old composite was removed, then
a new one created which was instantiated with a default parseTreeAllocation and
then after that the ImplicitAllocation was set.  Because the logic that deals
with implicit beans doesn't touch the bean cause it realizes it doesn't own it
this meant it never disposed it and there were 2 composites - the first and then
the second one.  ViewPartProxyAdapter now overrides the method to reinstantiate
children and deals with this correctly
